Class FlashLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • FlashLight

  • public class FlashLight
extends Object
    The FlashLight Class is used to show Trump's flashlight beam that can "kill" immigrants.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static ImageIcon blank 
      private static ImageIcon fire 
      private static boolean firing 
      private static ImageIcon myImage 
      private static int myX 
      private static int myY 
      private static boolean using 
      private static ImageIcon warning 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlashLight()
      Default Constructor for Flashlight.
      FlashLight(int y)
      Constructor for FlashLight.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void blank()
      Sets the image to a blank image, and sets isFiring and isUsing to false.
      void fire()
      Sets the image to the firing image, and sets isFiring and isUsing to true.
      ImageIcon getImageIcon()
      Returns the correct ImageIcon for the flashlight.
      boolean isFiring()
      Returns wether or not the flashlight is firing.
      boolean isUsing()
      Returns wether or not the flaslight is being used.
      void prepare()
      Sets the image to the warning image, and sets isFiring to false and isUsing to true.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlashLight

        public FlashLight()
        Default Constructor for Flashlight. It spawns at location 0,0, and it is not firing or being used, ,and the image is blank.
        Parameters:
        myX - initial x coordinate
        myY - initial y coordinate

      • FlashLight

        public FlashLight(int y)
        Constructor for FlashLight. x will always be 0, but you can specify the y location of the flashlight.
        Parameters:
        myX - initial x coordinate
        myY - initial y coordinate

    • Method Detail

      • getImageIcon

        public ImageIcon getImageIcon()
        Returns the correct ImageIcon for the flashlight.
        Returns:
        myImage

      • isFiring

        public boolean isFiring()
        Returns wether or not the flashlight is firing.
        Returns:
        isFiring

      • isUsing

        public boolean isUsing()
        Returns wether or not the flaslight is being used.
        Returns:
        isUsing

      • blank

        public void blank()
        Sets the image to a blank image, and sets isFiring and isUsing to false.
        Parameters:
        isFiring - sets False
        isUsing - sets False
        myImage - sets blank

      • prepare

        public void prepare()
        Sets the image to the warning image, and sets isFiring to false and isUsing to true.
        Parameters:
        isFiring - sets False
        isUsing - sets True
        myImage - sets warning

      • fire

        public void fire()
        Sets the image to the firing image, and sets isFiring and isUsing to true.
        Parameters:
        isFiring - sets True
        isUsing - sets True
        myImage - sets fire
